text: "Say You Love Me" is a 1976 song by British American band Fleetwood Mac and taken from their 10th studio album Fleetwood Mac. It went to number 11 in the United States, number 29 in Canada, number 38 in Australia and number 40 in the United Kingdom. It was covered by Canadian singer-songwriter Shirley Eikhard and went to number 34 in Canada in 1976. Category:1976 songs Category:Fleetwood Mac songs
title: Say You Love Me (Fleetwood Mac song)
